original_text:
The Lord watches over the foreigner
    and sustains the fatherless and the widow,
    but he frustrates the ways of the wicked.
korean_text: 여호와께서 나그네들을 보호하시며 고아와 과부를 붙드시고 악인들의 길은 굽게 하시는도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord watches over the foreigner
and sustains the fatherless and the widow
but he frustrates the ways of the wicked
